name: The Little Match Girl - FREE Hidden Object Game
name_original: The Little Match Girl - FREE Hidden Object Game
description:
The most original hidden object game in the app store!

Follow a distressed father as he explores a variety of mysterious locations, searching for his missing daughter.

An explorer sets off on a journey with his daughter to reunite with her mother. Before they can reach her, they encounter a blizzard and his daughter goes missing. While searching for her, he comes across a little girl selling matches. As he investigates further, he is gradually pulled into a sinister plot, and he eventually discovers that the key to finding his missing daughter lies with the little match girl!

“Linda, my precious daughter, I WILL find you!”

You must follow an anxious father’s every step as he searches for his missing daughter in this amazing game that combines puzzles with hidden object gameplay.

Special bonuses can be unlocked in the game via in-app purchases.

•More than 100 levels to explore.
•A variety of beautiful backgrounds.
•Super fun “free mode”.
•Jigsaw puzzle minigames.
•Will be updated regularly with special holiday events, competitive rankings, an endless supply of levels to play, and more awesome and fun-packed content.
